Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 72nd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1971...
Earned first career win on 6/24/1977...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1978...
Had first career hit (triple) on 7/22/1980, off Juan Ortega (Min)...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1981...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Wisconsin on 7/21/1982 (Going to WIS: C J. Bustillos, CF G. Albino, P R. Gallegos. Going to PIT: RF J. Cardella, 2B A. Gies, P A. Zamora, C S. Nolan)...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 2/14/1989 to a 3-year deal worth $3,552,100 per year...
